content.body: but it only takes one bitflip to make it so

content.body: you're assuming that's intentional rather than either them not caring about CSP, not being aware of CSP, or CSP being incredibly hard to not screw up
also a lot of the directives are overly broad, so, until recently, you had to permit eval even to just run wasm fully sandboxed
I’m not assuming that, I just mean we need to worry about what happens when it happens
